commitSecret(bytes32).details: User commits the hash of their secret (secret + salt).

reveal(string,bytes32).details: (Optional) verify the secret off-chain or reveal in a commit-reveal scheme.

storage.contract: C/Confidentiality/Off-Chain Encryption On-Chain Hash or ZK Approach.sol:CommitmentStorage
storage.label: commitments

userdoc.notice: Defense scenario: We store only a hashed or zero-knowledge commitment  so the underlying secret remains off-chain or encrypted.

ast.absolutePath: C/Confidentiality/Off-Chain Encryption On-Chain Hash or ZK Approach.sol

documentation.text:
Defense scenario:
 We store only a hashed or zero-knowledge commitment 
 so the underlying secret remains off-chain or encrypted.
@dev User commits the hash of their secret (secret + salt).
@dev (Optional) verify the secret off-chain or reveal in a commit-reveal scheme.
